mapper.insert: INSERT INTO EM_SEQ ( ITEM_NAME, MIN_VALUE, MAX_VALUE, CURRENT_INDEX, INCREMENT_VALUE, ITEM_LENGTH, PREFIX, POSTFIX, REPEATABLE, FORMATTER, CREATE_AUTHOR, CREATE_DATETIME, UPDATE_AUTHOR, UPDATE_DATETIME ) VALUES ( #{itemName}, #{minValue}, #{maxValue}, #{currentIndex}, #{incrementValue}, #{itemLength}, #{prefix}, #{postfix}, #{repeatable}, #{formatter}, #{createAuthor}, current_timestamp(), #{updateAuthor}, current_timestamp() )
mapper.update: UPDATE EM_SEQ SET MIN_VALUE = #{minValue}, MAX_VALUE = #{maxValue}, CURRENT_INDEX = #{currentIndex}, INCREMENT_VALUE = #{incrementValue}, ITEM_LENGTH = #{itemLength}, PREFIX = #{prefix}, POSTFIX = #{postfix}, REPEATABLE = #{repeatable}, FORMATTER = #{formatter}, CREATE_AUTHOR = #{createAuthor}, CREATE_DATETIME = #{createDatetime}, UPDATE_AUTHOR = #{updateAuthor}, UPDATE_DATETIME = current_timestamp() WHERE UPDATE_DATETIME = #{updateDatetime} AND ITEM_NAME = #{itemName} AND UPDATE_DATETIME = #{updateDatetime}
mapper.select: SELECT ITEM_NAME AS "itemName", MIN_VALUE AS "minValue", MAX_VALUE AS "maxValue", CURRENT_INDEX AS "currentIndex", INCREMENT_VALUE AS "incrementValue", ITEM_LENGTH AS "itemLength", PREFIX AS "prefix", POSTFIX AS "postfix", REPEATABLE AS "repeatable", FORMATTER AS "formatter", CREATE_AUTHOR AS "createAuthor", CREATE_DATETIME AS "createDatetime", UPDATE_AUTHOR AS "updateAuthor", UPDATE_DATETIME AS "updateDatetime" FROM EM_SEQ WHERE ITEM_NAME = #{itemName}

SELECT ITEM_NAME AS "itemName", MIN_VALUE AS "minValue", MAX_VALUE AS "maxValue", CURRENT_INDEX AS "currentIndex", INCREMENT_VALUE AS "incrementValue", ITEM_LENGTH AS "itemLength", PREFIX AS "prefix", POSTFIX AS "postfix", REPEATABLE AS "repeatable", FORMATTER AS "formatter", CREATE_AUTHOR AS "createAuthor", CREATE_DATETIME AS "createDatetime", UPDATE_AUTHOR AS "updateAuthor", UPDATE_DATETIME AS "updateDatetime" FROM EM_SEQ WHERE ITEM_NAME = #{itemName} FOR UPDATE

SELECT ITEM_NAME AS "itemName", MIN_VALUE AS "minValue", MAX_VALUE AS "maxValue", CURRENT_INDEX AS "currentIndex", INCREMENT_VALUE AS "incrementValue", ITEM_LENGTH AS "itemLength", PREFIX AS "prefix", POSTFIX AS "postfix", REPEATABLE AS "repeatable", FORMATTER AS "formatter", CREATE_AUTHOR AS "createAuthor", CREATE_DATETIME AS "createDatetime", UPDATE_AUTHOR AS "updateAuthor", UPDATE_DATETIME AS "updateDatetime" FROM EM_SEQ WHERE 1 = 1 AND ITEM_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{itemName}, '%') AND MIN_VALUE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{minValue}, '%') AND MAX_VALUE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{maxValue}, '%') AND CURRENT_INDEX LIKE CONCAT('%', #{currentIndex}, '%') AND INCREMENT_VALUE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{incrementValue}, '%') AND ITEM_LENGTH LIKE CONCAT('%', #{itemLength}, '%') AND PREFIX LIKE CONCAT('%', #{prefix}, '%') AND POSTFIX LIKE CONCAT('%', #{postfix}, '%') AND REPEATABLE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{repeatable}, '%') AND FORMATTER LIKE CONCAT('%', #{formatter}, '%') AND CREATE_AUTHOR LIKE CONCAT('%', #{createAuthor}, '%') AND UPDATE_AUTHOR LIKE CONCAT('%', #{updateAuthor}, '%') AND CREATE_DATETIME > #{createDatetime} AND UPDATE_DATETIME > #{updateDatetime} ORDER BY ${theOrderByCondition} GROUP BY ${theGroupByCondition} LIMIT ${theFetchStart} , ${theFetchSize}

SELECT ITEM_NAME AS "itemName", MIN_VALUE AS "minValue", MAX_VALUE AS "maxValue", CURRENT_INDEX AS "currentIndex", INCREMENT_VALUE AS "incrementValue", ITEM_LENGTH AS "itemLength", PREFIX AS "prefix", POSTFIX AS "postfix", REPEATABLE AS "repeatable", FORMATTER AS "formatter", CREATE_AUTHOR AS "createAuthor", CREATE_DATETIME AS "createDatetime", UPDATE_AUTHOR AS "updateAuthor", UPDATE_DATETIME AS "updateDatetime" FROM EM_SEQ WHERE 1 = 1 AND ( ${itemName} ) AND ( ${minValue} ) AND ( ${maxValue} ) AND ( ${currentIndex} ) AND ( ${incrementValue} ) AND ( ${itemLength} ) AND ( ${prefix} ) AND ( ${postfix} ) AND ( ${repeatable} ) AND ( ${formatter} ) AND ( ${theSQLCondition} ) ORDER BY ${theOrderByCondition} GROUP BY ${theGroupByCondition} LIMIT ${theFetchStart} , ${theFetchSize}
